titles: The case of the inhabitants of the town of Bradford
notes: Immediately under title: We the makers and others concerned in the manufacture of set-work (commonly called Turky work), inhabitants of the town of Bradford, and parts adjacent in the west-riding of the county of York.
Reproduction of the original in the Lincoln's Inn Library.
